author: Staff Reporter
text:
The football team of Loyola College, Chennai, which won The Centenary Tournaments trophy at St. Joseph's College in Tiruchi.

Loyola College, Chennai, won the football title in The Centenary Tournaments of St. Joseph’s College here on Wednesday.

The three-day event, which attracted 12 colleges, was a knockout format. In the final, Loyola College defeated St. Joseph’s College through penalty shootout after the teams were locked goalless at full-time. Jamal Mohamed College, Tiruchi, bagged the third spot. Rev. Fr. S. Sebastian, secretary, St. Joseph’s College, gave away the prizes in the presence of A. Peter Pascal Regis, vice-principal, Rev. Fr. Aruldoss, sports coordinator, and A. Prem Edwin, Director of Physical Education.
title: Loyola College wins football title
